item.description:
A kickoff marketing meeting has been planned to put together marketing materials for use across the state.
It is important that we stress the same points at the same time, in the same way so regardless of
who, what event, or where, we have a consistent message that is easy to get across. Then we will add more points to the list as time goes on.

We will be manning booths at a number of festivals and fairs this coming year, hopefully gun shows, ball games, sponsorships, where ever we can tell the freedom story.

I have many ideas, I am sure you all do too.

Please join us. barbara g.

Location:

Starbucks
1319 Boston Post Road
Milford, CT

Just past the Milford Mall main entrance on the right in a small strip mall heading towards Orange.
item.name: CT Marketing Meeting
